# Code of Conduct

We want a friendly, safe, and professional community.

## Expected behavior
- Be respectful and constructive.
- Assume good intent; ask clarifying questions.
- Provide actionable feedback.
- Respect privacy and confidentiality.

## Unacceptable behavior
- Harassment, hate speech, or discrimination.
- Doxxing, threats, or targeted abuse.
- Deliberate disruption of discussions.

## Reporting
- For private reports, contact the repository owner via their GitHub profile.
- For non-sensitive concerns, open a GitHub issue and tag maintainers.

## Enforcement
Maintainers may warn, remove content, or restrict participation to keep the
community safe.
